item.description:
Obsessive Thinking and Ways to Alleviate It

Understand what obsessive thinking is and ways to remedy the pain that accompanies it. We'll practice techniques that will be useful for clearer and more choiceful thinking and being in charge of your thinking.

 

$40, Sliding scale available$40-20 based on ability to pay

 

Herb Pearce is a relationship therapist, personal life coach and humanist. He is the author of Herb's Tips for Living and The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

 

www.herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Obsessive Thinking and Ways to Alleviate It
